summary: The diff implements a comprehensive color theme update from warm gold/cream/charcoal to clean white and light blue across all major components. CSS custom properties, Tailwind config tokens, and component-level classes have all been updated. All acceptance criteria for REQ-6 appear to be addressed: white backgrounds, light blue accents, navy/dark text, updated brand tokens, updated CSS custom properties, and consistent application across Header, Hero, ServicesSection, ServiceCard, AboutSection, ContactSection, ContactForm, and Footer.
